history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: is_rel_prime_lcm. qsimpl time: 1 use: is_lcm_fun,is_rel_prime_lcm. qsimpl time: 1 use: is_lcm_mult,is_lcm_fun,is_rel_prime_lcm. qsimpl time: 1 use: is_lcm_mult,is_lcm_fun,is_rel_prime_lcm. qsimpl time: 1 use: is_lcm_sym,is_lcm_mult,is_lcm_fun,is_rel_prime_lcm. qsimpl time: 1 use: is_lcm_sym,is_lcm_mult,is_lcm_fun,is_rel_prime_lcm. qsimpl time: 1 use: is_lcm_sym,is_lcm_mult,is_lcm_fun,is_rel_prime_lcm.

ctx: apply is_gcd_rel_prime in H_gcd as [a [b [Hp [Hq Hgcd_ab]]]].
exceptions.exn: In environment p, q, g, l, a, b : nat Hp : p = a * g Hq : q = b * g Hgcd_ab : is_gcd a b 1 H_lcm : is_lcm p q l The term "a" has type "nat" while it is expected to have type "is_gcd ?p ?q 1".

ctx: apply is_gcd_rel_prime in H_gcd as [a [b [Hp [Hq Hgcd_ab]]]].
exceptions.tactic: rewrite is_lcm_fun with (r2 := a * b) (r1 := 1) in Hgcd_ab; auto.

exceptions.tactic: apply is_lcm_mult with (k := g) in H_lcm.

original: intros H_gcd H_lcm. apply is_gcd_rel_prime in H_gcd as [a [b [Hp [Hq Hgcd_ab]]]]. apply (is_rel_prime_lcm a b) in Hgcd_ab. rewrite is_lcm_fun with (r2 := a * b) (r1 := 1) in Hgcd_ab; auto. subst. apply is_lcm_mult with (k := g) in H_lcm. apply is_lcm_fun with (r2 := l) in H_lcm; auto. rewrite <- H_lcm. apply is_lcm_sym in H_lcm. apply is_rel_prime_lcm in Hgcd_ab. apply is_lcm_fun with (r1:= p*q) (r2:= g*l); auto. rewrite <- Nat.mul_shuffle1. rewrite Hq. apply is_lcm_sym in H_lcm.
